channel.title: Events for the M1

item.author: info@highwaysengland.co.uk
item.category: Minor Disruption - up to 15 minutes delay
item.description: Location : The M1 northbound at junction J24 . Reason : Congestion. Status : Currently Active. Return To Normal : Normal traffic conditions are expected between 22:00 and 22:15 on 22 April 2022. Delay : There are currently delays of 10 minutes against expected traffic.
item.title: M1 northbound within J24 | Northbound | Congestion
